<PropertyName>Script</PropertyName> <PropertyValue>// ************************************************** // Custom code for OrderAllocForm // Created: 1/28/2021 6:04:52 PM // ************************************************** // // REVISION LOG // // eb1 01/29/21 eric blackwelder @ cdi // prevent user from selecting kit component if not complete // // // **************************************************
using System; using System.ComponentModel; using System.Data; using System.Diagnostics; using System.Windows.Forms; using Erp.Adapters; using Erp.UI; using Ice.Lib; using Ice.Adapters; using Ice.Lib.Customization; using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps; using Ice.Lib.Framework; using Ice.Lib.Searches; using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;
using Infragistics.Win; using Infragistics.Win.UltraWinGrid;
public class Script { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! ** // Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **
// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **
EpiUltraGrid grdList = new EpiUltraGrid();
public void InitializeCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization
// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization
// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls
grdList = new EpiUltraGrid(); Control c1 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("fb7de392-22bb-419e-b092-94cc98974e25"); grdList = (EpiUltraGrid)c1; grdList.MouseUp += new System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler(this.grdList_MouseUp);
}
public void DestroyCustomCode() { // ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines ** // Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal
// End Wizard Added Object Disposal
// Begin Custom Code Disposal
// End Custom Code Disposal
grdList = null; grdList.MouseUp -= new System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventHandler(this.grdList_MouseUp);
}
private void grdList_MouseUp(object sender, System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs args) {
// Declare and retrieve a reference to the UIElement UIElement aUIElement = this. grdList.DisplayLayout.UIElement.ElementFromPoint( new System.Drawing.Point(args.X, args.Y)); // Declare and retrieve a reference to the cell UltraGridCell aCell = (UltraGridCell)aUIElement.GetContext(typeof(UltraGridCell));
// If a cell was found display the band and column key if(aCell != null) { //MessageBox.Show(aCell.Value.ToString()); //gives cell value //MessageBox.Show(aCell.Band.Index.ToString()); //gives row number //MessageBox.Show(aCell.Column.ToString()); //gives column name
if( aCell.Column.ToString() == "SelectedForAction") { if((string)aCell.Row.Cells["KitFlag"].Value == "C" && (decimal)aCell.Row.Cells["AvailablePercent"].Value != 100) { //MessageBox.Show("KitFlag: " + aCell.Row.Cells["KitFlag"].Value.ToString()); //MessageBox.Show("KitParentLine: " + aCell.Row.Cells["KitParentLine"].Value.ToString()); //MessageBox.Show("KitShipComplete: " + aCell.Row.Cells["KitShipComplete"].Value.ToString()); //MessageBox.Show("AvailablePercent: " + aCell.Row.Cells["AvailablePercent"].Value.ToString());
MessageBox.Show("Can't select kit component if short inventory"); aCell.Value = false;
/* // Override the read only aspect of the datagrid for the select column if ((bool)aCell.Value == false) { aCell.Value = true; } else { aCell.Value = false; } */ } }
}
}
}
</PropertyValue> <Company /> <Plant /> <DcdUserID /> <GroupID /> <PropertiesID /> </Properties> <Properties> <FormsID>OrderAllocForm</FormsID> <ControlName>Customization</ControlName>
